ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dvhopvadd2.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | dvhopvadd2.t | |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | dvhopvadd2.e | |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | dvhopvadd2.p | |- .+ = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | dvhopvadd2.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 6 |  | dvhopvadd2.s | |- .+b = ( +g ` U ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` U ) = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) = ( +g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 6, 8 | #P_dvhopvadd | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ Q e. E ) /\ ( G e. T /\ R e. E ) ) -> ( <. F , Q >. .+b <. G , R >. ) = <. ( F o. G ) , ( Q ( +g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) R ) >. ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 4, 8 | #P_dvhfplusr | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( +g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) = .+ ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ Q e. E ) /\ ( G e. T /\ R e. E ) ) -> ( +g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) = .+ ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ Q e. E ) /\ ( G e. T /\ R e. E ) ) -> ( Q ( +g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) R ) = ( Q .+ R ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_opeq2d | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ Q e. E ) /\ ( G e. T /\ R e. E ) ) -> <. ( F o. G ) , ( Q ( +g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) R ) >. = <. ( F o. G ) , ( Q .+ R ) >. ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ Q e. E ) /\ ( G e. T /\ R e. E ) ) -> ( <. F , Q >. .+b <. G , R >. ) = <. ( F o. G ) , ( Q .+ R ) >. ) |
